title: Retro Boxing Poster
content:
Hey Guys,

I want to make poster in the style of a retro boxing championship poster.  
Good tips on some awesome fonts and ornaments?  
I'm thinking big ass capital retro letters and lots of stars

Greets !
author: AnaBanana

comments.content: Perhaps too obvious (if that is even possible), [Knockout by Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720173047/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100013)...

Haha, thing is, I don't want to overuse this font (I already used it for other projects).  
But it's a really fitting suggestion indeed ;)

Parkinson-style:  
 [http://www.typedesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720173047/http:/www.typedesign.com/ "http://www.typedesign.com")  
Yes, Balboa is there (apparently a district of Jim’s hometown San Francisco, as I recently discovered…)
